review.reviewBody: The jalape√±o poppers (came with 2), are delicious! All of the rolls we had were great.

I have been going to Miraku for over 20 years and through multiple owners. Somehow they manage to maintain a good to really excellent standard. 

The current version is at a very high level. The sashimi is so moist and fresh. The Sashimi dinner is an excellent value. 

The rolls are consistently well made and fresh tasting.

Ordered the Teriyaki Dinner Box and came with more food items than expected! Teriyaki came in a covered aluminum pouch which was a brilliant idea so it stayed hot. Also ordered the Cali Combo . Delicious! Will order again.
For my taste the Carnival Roll had too many items that in the end I couldn't taste any one of them.
my favourite japanese restaurant in langley, it is always good. the Chicken Katsu and  Appetizer Tempura are amazing!
